summary: Major API version bump with new GraphQL endpoint, rate limiting improvements, and deprecation of REST v1 endpoints.

features.title: GraphQL API (beta)
features.description: New /graphql endpoint supporting queries, mutations, and subscriptions.

features.title: Adaptive rate limiting
features.description: Rate limits now adjust based on account tier and historical usage patterns.

features.title: Webhook retry with exponential backoff
features.description: Failed webhook deliveries are retried up to 5 times with increasing delay.

fixes.title: Pagination cursor overflow
fixes.description: Cursor values exceeding 2^53 now handled correctly with string-based cursors.

breaking_changes.title: REST v1 endpoints removed
breaking_changes.migration: Migrate to /v2/* or use the new GraphQL API.

breaking_changes.title: Date format changed to ISO 8601
breaking_changes.description: All date fields now return ISO 8601 format instead of Unix timestamps.
breaking_changes.migration: Update date parsing to handle ISO 8601 strings.
